searchParameters.q: Shriners Hospitals for Children - Portland website

knowledgeGraph.title: Shriners Children's Portland
knowledgeGraph.description: The Shriners Children's Portland is a 29-bed, non-profit pediatric hospital located in Portland, in the U.S. state of Oregon. It specializes in orthopedics, cleft lip, and palate disorders as part of the 22-hospital system belonging to the Shriners Hospitals for Children.
